name: bemusedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you slightly confused or shows that you are slightly confused: He just stared bemusedly, unable to figure out why she was so upset. The students nodded along bemusedly during the professor's lecture, and at the end of it, none of them had any idea what he'd been talking about. Related word
bemused
More examplesFewer examples"Why did he wait so long to tell me?" she wondered bemusedly. A small crowd gathered bemusedly to hear the busker who started to perform with no announcement in the town square.
